p: The EU‐FORA fellow was hosted by the German Federal Institute for Risk Assessment (BfR), Department of Food Safety, Unit of Nutritional Risks, Allergies and Novel Foods. Within the agreed work programme that was entitled ‘Risk assessment of botanical preparations used in food supplements and fortified foods’, the main task of the fellow was the preparation of a monograph regarding the risk assessment of Annona muricata and preparations derived thereof with respect to use in food supplements.
